title: Anglian waterways: river conditions, closures and restrictions (The Environment Agency)
text: ( Source : The Environment Agency ) Strong Stream Advice The Environment Agency issues Strong Stream Advice ( SSA ) to inform river users when river levels are increasing and when locks are being prepared to discharge flood water. Notice boards ,
